release.action: History feature was rewritten. The plugin now checks out a complete copy of all 1.1 revisions to the target directory.
Property for include was fixed and property for exclude was added.
Split up generate goal into two, to allow for calling StatCvs-XML without updating the cvs log
The CVS connection string is now parsed from the pom.
The repository url is checked for an empty value and not passed to StatCvs-XML in that case.
